main event: A red balloon-like object was observed flashing about 3 times in 30 seconds, moving at high speed without sound or power, before disappearing from sight.
interesting points: The object appeared to be higher than a small balloon.
The object moved at a high speed.
The object caused a brief sighting before disappearing.
Weather conditions were reported as a factor in the sighting.
The sighting was ultimately concluded to be a weather balloon released in the area.
